/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

The street itself is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A few cars can be seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene.

The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used, which gives it a unique, almost surreal quality. Despite this distortion, the image provides a detailed and vivid depiction of a typical day on a street in Beijing. It's a blend of nature, architecture, and urban life, all captured in one frame.
